wiki.summary: "Official bootleg" recorded in Bitterfield, Germany, on 2006-07-10. Primitive sound quality with very little editing. Released digitally on December 16, 2015, as a single-track, pay-what-you-want download. Contents: 1. Sary Oy - 8:27 2. Sign of War - 9:43 3. Improvisation that later became part of Epos - 1:34 (starts at 18:09) 4. Primitive Dance - 10:02 (starts at 19:43) 5. Marching of the Hordes (Pagan cover) - 3:07 (starts at 29:46) Darkestrah's lineup for this recording was: Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: "Official bootleg" recorded in Bitterfield, Germany, on 2006-07-10. Primitive sound quality with very little editing. Released digitally on December 16, 2015, as a single-track, pay-what-you-want download. Contents: 1. Sary Oy - 8:27 2. Sign of War - 9:43 3. Improvisation that later became part of Epos - 1:34 (starts at 18:09) 4. Primitive Dance - 10:02 (starts at 19:43) 5. Marching of the Hordes (Pagan cover) - 3:07 (starts at 29:46) Darkestrah's lineup for this recording was: • Resurgemus - Guitars • Asbath - Drums • Anti - Bass • Sharthar - Keyboards • Kriegtalith - Vocals Read more on Last.fm.
